Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Wrist Curls (No Equipment)
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Rest forearm on a surface and flex wrist upwards repeatedly.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Wrist Extensions
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Rest forearm on a surface and extend wrist upwards repeatedly.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Finger Push-ups
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Perform push-ups while balancing on fingertips.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Wall Finger Holds
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Press fingertips against a wall and hold for endurance training.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Reverse Wrist Stretch
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Extend fingers backward with palm facing down to stretch the wrist.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Pronation & Supination Drills
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Rotate your wrists from palm up to palm down repeatedly.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Wrist Rotations
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Slowly rotate wrists in circles to improve mobility and prevent injuries.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Palm Presses
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Press palms together and push against each other to build strength.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Claw Grip Squeeze
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Make a claw shape with fingers and squeeze tightly for grip strength.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Isometric Wrist Hold
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Hold the wrist in a neutral position with tension for endurance.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Wall Handstands (Forearm Activation)
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Perform a handstand against a wall to strengthen wrists and forearms.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Tabletop Wrist Lifts
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: On all fours, lift wrists off the floor while keeping fingers down.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Backhand Finger Push-ups
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Perform push-ups with the back of hands resting on the floor.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Fist Push-ups
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Perform push-ups while balancing on fists.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Wrist Push-ups
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Lower yourself down and push back up using only wrist flexion.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Towel Grip Holds
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Squeeze a towel tightly for a sustained period to improve grip.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Finger Isometric Holds
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Press fingertips against a hard surface and hold for time.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Dynamic Finger Flicks
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Quickly extend fingers outward repeatedly to build speed and endurance.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Reverse Plank Wrist Stretch
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Sit back into a reverse plank while stretching wrists backward.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Wrist Controlled Articular Rotations (CARs)
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Perform slow, controlled wrist rotations focusing on full range of motion.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Finger Taps
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Individually tap each fingertip to your thumb as quickly as possible.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Wrist Walks
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Walk hands up and down a wall using only fingertips.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Finger Lifts
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Place hand flat on the floor and lift each finger individually.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: Piano Finger Taps
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Move fingers up and down as if playing piano, keeping wrist stable.

Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.name: One-Finger Push-ups
Wrist & Forearm Strengthening.description: Perform push-ups balancing on only one or two fingers.
